data.name: Scribble It! - Premium Edition
data.detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!

  • Use all the Word Packages from our amazing Community, not just your creations!
  • Create lobbies with Guess It! - Grand Reveal and Rate It! for anybody to join.
  • Play in Teams with other players to draw, guess and rate with them together.
    Keep in mind, that every player who wants to join a team requires the Premium Edition.
  • 30 new Avatars
data.about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!

  • Use all the Word Packages from our amazing Community, not just your creations!
  • Create lobbies with Guess It! - Grand Reveal and Rate It! for anybody to join.
  • Play in Teams with other players to draw, guess and rate with them together.
    Keep in mind, that every player who wants to join a team requires the Premium Edition.
  • 30 new Avatars
data.short_description: This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!Use all the Word Packages from our amazing Community!Play Guess It! - Grand Reveal and Rate It! Play in Teams30 new Avatars
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Finnish, Hungarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32-/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 400 Series / AMD® Radeon HD 7000 Series / Intel® HD Graphics 4000 with 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon 200 Series with 1024MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal compatible graphics card is required.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal compatible graphics card is required.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon HD 7000 Series / Intel® HD Graphics 5000 with 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon 200 Series with 1024MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.
